title: FS: Doc Crandall with multi-strike overprint back
author: Pat R

posts.post_title: FS: Doc Crandall with multi-strike overprint back
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE]$7500.00[/STRIKE] $7000.00 paypal f&f [STRIKE]$7800.00 [/STRIKE] $7280.00paypal g&s includes shipping and insurance.

There are several backs 

1. Tolstoi
2. two upside down split Piedmont 350-460 backs
3. Sam Crawford (batting)
4. Al Burch (fielding)
5. Upside down T68 Victor Emmanuel

I will include the Emanuel with the Crandall.

If anyone has the Gandil, I would be interested.
